page.title: 10LUDLOW SCHOOLS 2
page.content: Ludlow County Junior School,Clee View caters for all Ludlow's children of junior age - 7-11years.It is of open-plan design and opened in 1972.Currently it has 405 children, 16 teachers including headmaster Mr E. Finney and 6 ancillaries. 1031 children attend Ludlow School,Burway.This is a Comprehensive school with 62 teachers,including headmaster Mr P. Suthern and 14 ancillaries. Ludlow College,Principal Mr R. Burns, has 29 full-time and 11 part-time teachers,6 ancillaries and 383 students aged 16+.
